message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know you value the money, so I'm offering you a good deal.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the money is worth less to you with each round. This is a fair compromise.
The value decreases rapidly, Bob. I'm offering you a chance to secure a good amount. Don't be greedy!
The value of the money may be decreasing for you, but it's not for me. I'm willing to take a bigger share. You should consider accepting before it's worth even less to you.
